stories.title: Define Supabase schema
stories.description: As a developer, I want to define the Supabase schema, so that energy data can be stored and queried efficiently.

stories.title: Seed initial data
stories.description: As a data engineer, I want to seed initial data for locations and energy sources, so the optimization APIs can be tested.

stories.title: Supabase client integration
stories.description: As a developer, I want to connect the Supabase client to my backend, so the APIs can store and retrieve data.

stories.title: Forecast energy load (QNN)
stories.description: As a system operator, I want to forecast energy demand using past data, so I can plan resource usage.

stories.title: /forecast API
stories.description: As a developer, I want a REST API `/forecast` that returns load predictions per location and hour.

stories.title: Forecast logging & accuracy
stories.description: As a data scientist, I want to log model predictions and actuals, so I can evaluate model accuracy.

stories.title: Optimize grid switching
stories.description: As a grid manager, I want to optimize energy source switching based on cost and availability.

stories.title: /optimize-switching API
stories.description: As a developer, I want a REST API `/optimize-switching` that returns a source schedule.

stories.title: Optimize battery schedule
stories.description: As a battery operator, I want to generate a charge/discharge plan based on load and cost.

stories.title: /optimize-battery API
stories.description: As a developer, I want a REST API `/optimize-battery` that returns a schedule of battery actions.

stories.title: API test coverage
stories.description: As a QA engineer, I want unit tests for each endpoint, so I can verify correct behavior.

stories.title: Forecast evaluation
stories.description: As a system evaluator, I want to calculate the accuracy of forecasts, so I can measure model performance.

stories.title: Deploy backend
stories.description: As a developer, I want to deploy the API backend online, so I can demo it easily.

stories.title: API docs or dashboard
stories.description: As a stakeholder, I want a Swagger/OpenAPI interface or basic UI, so I can explore the system quickly.
